long_description: When using the Stan's NoTubes Tire Sealant in a tubeless-converted standard tire or a tubeless tire, holes up to a 1/4 in. can be sealed instantly, enabling you to ride on without having to stop. Only 2 oz. of sealant is needed for most bicycle tires; measuring scoop and Yorker spout included. 16 oz. of sealant can convert up to 8 tires. Stan's NoTubes Tire Sealant will stay liquid in a mountain bike tire with a thin casing for 2 - 7 mo. on average. Riding in arid climates or storing the bike in a hot area will require more frequent monitoring of sealant levels.
short_description: When using the Stan's NoTubes Tire Sealant in a tubeless-converted standard tire or a tubeless tire, holes up to a 1/4 in. can be sealed instantly, enabling you to ride on without having to stop.
